titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I wrote a sermon for use next Sunday. Then I studied Hilaire Belloc in 'Land & Water' but got from him little light and less comfort. Then I attended Evensong in the Cathedral: & afterwards took Logic for a walk in the rain. Finally I wrote letters. Lillingston called to see me.
